Work Experience

    Senior Developer   Aug 2019 – Nov 2023

    Roles & Responsibilities

  • Conduct thorough testing and debugging of mobile applications, identifying and resolving any bugs, glitches, or usability issues to deliver error-free and reliable solutions.
  • Design, develop, and deploy high-quality mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms, ensuring optimal performance, functionality, and user experience.
  • Provide ongoing technical support and troubleshooting assistance to customers, promptly addressing their inquiries and concerns to ensure a satisfactory user experience.

About Me

Dynamic Technology Professional with over 4 years of progressive experience in Mobile Application Development,Client Handling and Team Management. Proven expertise in developing and executing strategic plans that align with corporate objectives. A dedicated and customer-focused professional with a background in software engineering.

My Country INDIA

India,the second-most populous country in the world,is known for its rich cultural heritage,diverse landscapes,and vibrant history.From the majestic Himalayas in the north to the tropical shores of Kerala in the south,India boasts an array of geographical beauty.It is a land of spiritual diversity, with Hinduism,Buddhism,and many other religions having roots here.India's economic progress is substantial,and its contributions to technology, arts, and global culture make it a significant player on the world stage.
